item.title: New College plans to erect statue of slain activist Charlie Kirk on campus

item.title: UF Extension Service opens new educational greenhouse
item.description: The facility is located at 6600 Clark Road, just east of I-75 near Twin Lakes Park.

item.title: ‘He spoke nothing but the truth:’ Suncoast remembers Charlie Kirk
item.description: Many people at the vigil said they remember Kirk as not just a political activist, but an man of God.

item.title: Deputies shoot armed man during Parrish domestic disturbance, sheriff’s office says
item.description: The suspect allegedly disobeyed commands and pulled a firearm from his waistband.

item.description: Cicadas are out in full force. But wherefore art thou, dear love bugs?

item.title: Two men kill each other during argument, Hillsborough sheriff’s office says
item.description: Detectives believe the two men began arguing and exchanged gunfire.

item.title: Sarasota County EMTs have new high-tech tool to help save lives
item.description: The ultrasound system allows paramedics to conduct live telemedicine consults in the field.
